actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to extend for 3 years the requirement of increased payments to States under medicaid plans for compensation or training of inspectors of long-term care institutions.

summary.text: Extends for three years the requirement of increased payments to States under medicaid plans under the Social Security Act for compensation or training of inspectors of long-term care institutions.

titles.title: A bill to extend for 3 years the requirement of increased payments to States under medicaid plans for compensation or training of inspectors of long-term care institutions.
